Introduction to Isaac AI Brain (NVIDIA Isaac™)

digital-twin/index.title: Digital Twin Module (Gazebo & Unity)
digital-twin/index.description: This module covers the creation of digital twins in robotics using Gazebo for physics simulation and Unity for high-fidelity visual representation.

digital-twin/intro.title: Introduction to Digital Twins in Robotics

digital-twin/setup.title: Prerequisites and Setup for Digital Twin Development

intro.title: Introduction: The Future of AI-Humanoid Robotics
intro.description: Welcome to the AI-Humanoid Technical Book - your comprehensive guide to understanding and building next-generation humanoid robots that seamlessly integrate artificial intelligence, perception, navigation, and action systems. This book explores the cutting-edge intersection of AI and robotics, providing both theoretical foundations and practical implementations.

isaac-ai-brain/index.title: Isaac AI Brain Module (NVIDIA Isaac™)
isaac-ai-brain/index.description: This module covers advanced robot perception, navigation, and autonomy using NVIDIA Isaac and ROS 2. The focus is on Isaac Sim fundamentals, Isaac ROS accelerated perception/VSLAM, and Nav2-based humanoid navigation with clear learning outcomes for perception, training, and autonomous movement.

isaac-ai-brain/intro.title: Introduction to Isaac AI Brain (NVIDIA Isaac™)

quickstart.title: Quick Start
quickstart.description: Get started with the AI-Humanoid Technical Book in minutes.

ros2-nervous-system/glossary.title: Glossary of ROS 2 Terms
ros2-nervous-system/glossary.description: This glossary provides definitions for key terms used throughout the ROS 2 as Robotic Nervous System module.

ros2-nervous-system/index.title: ROS 2 as Robotic Nervous System
ros2-nervous-system/index.description: Welcome to the ROS 2 as Robotic Nervous System module. This section explores how ROS 2 functions as a middleware nervous system that connects AI decision-making to physical robot control.

ros2-nervous-system/python-agents.title: ROS 2 Communication with Python Agents
ros2-nervous-system/python-agents.description: This chapter explains how to bridge Python-based AI agents to robot controllers using client libraries, focusing on practical examples of AI-to-robot communication patterns.

ros2-nervous-system/ros2-fundamentals.title: ROS 2 Fundamentals
ros2-nervous-system/ros2-fundamentals.description: This chapter introduces the fundamental concepts of ROS 2 as a middleware nervous system that connects AI decision-making to physical robot control.

ros2-nervous-system/urdf-modeling.title: Humanoid Modeling with URDF
ros2-nervous-system/urdf-modeling.description: This chapter explains how humanoid robot structure is defined using URDF (Unified Robot Description Format), covering links, joints, and physical properties that define robot structure.

vla-integration/capstone-project.title: Capstone: Autonomous Humanoid with Voice Commands and Manipulation
